companyName: CBL & Associates Properties Inc. Depositary Shs Repstg 1/10 6.625% Ser E Cum Redeemable (Pfd Stk)
description: CBL & Associates Properties Inc is a real estate investment trust. It owns, develops, acquires, leases, manages, and operates regional shopping malls, open-air and mixed-use centers, community centers and office properties and outlet centers.
